name: Boo
description:
Boo is a local multiplayer experience for an Oculus Rift player vs. PC player.

Set in the dark shadow woods, among the lost ruins, you can play one on one as the grim reaper in virtual reality to rally the lost souls of the undead or as the ghost master with real time strategy on desktop to see who will be the last one standing.

Oculus Rift Windows Only

This game is currently on Oculus CV1 for Windows.

The project is currently on hold, any donations would be appreciated for further development of the game.

For more info: www.boothegame.xyz
